price: Ya ce: "Shin, wanin Allah nike nẽma muku ya zama abin bautãwa, alhãli kuwa Shĩ (Allah) Ya fĩfĩta ku a kan halittu?"
arabic: قَالَ أَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ أَبۡغِيكُمۡ إِلَٰهٗا وَهُوَ فَضَّلَكُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla aghayra al-lahi abghīkum ilāhan wahuwa faḍḍalakum ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
